title: Pixel 3 (with one day of use) Doesn't turn on and says that the device is corrupt.
content:
Hi, yesterday I bought a Pixel 3. After less than 24 hours, the device crashed and started a bootloop. Then, the phone turned off. Now it only appears the following message: Your device is corrupt.
I don't know what can I do now. This problem started in less than 24 h of use. Please help.
